evergreen.description: Always growing, always green, and always calm, evergreen nodes are slowly updated over time.

archived.description: Once legendary, for one reason or another these nodes fell from fame. For historic reasons, I keep em around, but I would never use it as information, even if your life depends on it!

unstable.description: Updating at the speed of light, blink once or twice and what you were just reading might be gone!

sunset.description: All good things must come to an end, but that's not always a sad thing. The end of the day means the start of a new one. Sunset posts were once evergreens, now ready to give life for new pages

seed.description: Still young, while seeds don't look like anything much, they have the power to grow into something beautiful if given love

blog.description: A fleshed out story, one you just might want to read
